title: Playoff Talk With Roy Wood Jr.
itunes:title: Playoff Talk With Roy Wood Jr.
description:
Miles and Jack are joined by the phenomenal comedian, actor and Daily Show Correspondent Roy Wood Jr for the latest episode of Mad Boosties. The trio discuss the playoff teams they are most excited about, as well as Roy’s longtime love of the Charlotte Hornets.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
